content.question: The veranda post of enthroned king and senior wife (Opo Ogoga) is similar to the Mayan Yaxchilán Lintel 25, Structure 23 in that both works

choices.label: represent the importance of royal wives
portray moments of women’s daily lives

content.answer: represent the importance of royal wives

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe similarities and/or differences in two or more works of art using appropriate and relevant points of comparison.
